ensure_ascii.description: If ensure_ascii is true, the output is guaranteed to have all incoming non-ASCII characters escaped. If ensure_ascii is false, these characters will be output as-is. To learn more, see https://docs.python.org/3/library/json.html.

save_partitioned_scoring_results.description: If true, scoring results will be written to multiple files in the `partitioned_scoring_results` directory. If false, scoring results returned to the caller.
